title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Abby: PART 1
itunes:title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Abby: PART 1
description:
The Best Bits podcast is now officially separated into two podcasts!! This part of the podcast is the version you all have been wanting as a stand-alone, Morgan and a guest having their in-depth conversations without any interruptions. In this podcast you’ll hear Morgan and Abby go off the rails in a true girl talk fashion about things happening in their life lately, the thing they’re geeking out over, and treat brain. Plus they talk about their relationships, listener encounters, Abby’s performance at the Strawberry festival, the Morgan Wallen concert, and who on the show doesn’t follow Abby on Instagram.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
